name: ps_scan2bsml
description: Formats prosite scan output into bsml format.

options.description: The input file (should be prosite scan output)
Where the output bsml file should be
Analysis id. Should most likely by ps_scan_analysis.
Path to the query file (input fasta file) for ps_scan.
A non-zero value will result in compressed bsml output. If no .gz is on the end of the bsml output name, one will be added.
In case you wanted a log file.
There are no debug statements in this program. Sorry.
